catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 8
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed: Buddha seated on lotus blossom; pedestal supported by sneering three-headed elephant; figure wears ornate headdress, and holds two metal objects; lips are colored red; lips, underside of trunks, inside of ears, and lotus blossoms on elephants are also red
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Fugen Enmei Bosatsu
